name: KirbyWithAGun
description:
Made at a GameJam with the theme "based on a meme".

Lore:

Kirby had grown tired of always being seen as the cute, sweet and childish one. He wanted to try something new. He found some red mushrooms in the forest and started eating. What he didn’t know was that they were poisonous. and alive… Kirby hasn't been the same since. He got a severe depression, and became addicted to the mushrooms. To keep his depression at bay, you need to kill. Also remember. A mushroom a day keeps the death away.
